Parallelism_key2: Parallel processing/Parallelism is the ability of the brain to do many things (aka, processes) at once.
Parallelism_key3: For Example- You are doing your homework, and any friend calls you to chit-chat. While talking on your phone, you are continuously working on your homework. Here you are working on two different things at the same time.
Parallelism_key4: Try to think of a daily life example of Parallelism.
